    • Method Detail

      • loadFile

        void loadFile(java.lang.String path)
              throws android.os.RemoteException
        Load libraries to access the file here so that it only has to be done once. This will always be the first function called
        Parameters:
        path - - the path of the file to be loaded
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getWordsForPage

        java.lang.String getWordsForPage(int page)
                                 throws android.os.RemoteException
        The indexer will query the contents of each page one at a time. Sending all of the information at once is too large to transfer in some files.
        Parameters:
        page - - the page to be returned from the file
        Returns:
        - A string containing all of the words on the page
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getPageCount

        int getPageCount()
                 throws android.os.RemoteException
        Gets the number of pages in the file previously specified in loadFile(String path)
        Returns:
        - the number of pages in the file specified at loadFile(String path)
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
